characters.name: Homer
characters.dialogue:
Bart! Doh I've been stabbed. 
 Homer dies on the floor. Go find help, Ned's house is across the street.

characters.name: Ned
characters.dialogue:
Hi didly ho Bart! Homers dead? Oh no! I knew my satan sense was tingling. I did see someone walking towards the Kwik-E-Mart down the street. 
 Investigate the Kwik-E-Mart using the car in the Simpsons driveway. Homer keeps his car keys in the dining room.

characters.name: Smithers
characters.dialogue: Hello Bart. What are you doing here? Homers dead?

characters.name: Apu
characters.dialogue: Hi bart, welcome to my store, before i talk to you, you must buy an item

characters.name: Sideshow Bob
characters.dialogue: HEY BART GET BACK OVER HERE
